entries.name: EVENTS
entries.desc: Events that a Handler should respond to.

entries.name: alias(anchor)
entries.desc: Called when an alias is found to anchor.  anchor will be the name of the anchor found.

entries.name: empty()
entries.desc: Called when an empty event happens. (Which, as far as I can tell, is never).

entries.name: end_document(implicit)
entries.desc: Called with the document ends.  implicit is a boolean value indicating whether or not the document has an implicit ending.

entries.name: end_stream()
entries.desc: Called when the YAML stream ends

entries.name: event_location(start_line, start_column, end_line, end_column)
entries.desc: Called before each event with line/column information.

entries.name: scalar(value, anchor, tag, plain, quoted, style)
entries.desc: Called when a scalar value is found.  The scalar may have an anchor, a tag, be implicitly plain or implicitly quoted

entries.name: start_document(version, tag_directives, implicit)
entries.desc: Called when the document starts with the declared version, tag_directives, if the document is implicit.

entries.name: start_sequence(anchor, tag, implicit, style)
entries.desc: Called when a sequence is started.

entries.name: start_stream(encoding)
entries.desc: Called with encoding when the YAML stream starts.  This method is called once per stream.  A stream may contain multiple documents.

entries.name: streaming?()
entries.desc: Is this handler a streaming handler?
